## Repeated contrast

::: columns

:::: pull-left

- （順序が決まっている）隣り合う水準同士を比較
  - 実験群1 vs 実験群2
  - 実験群2 vs 実験群3...

--

- 例：語の頻度の効果を，隣り合う水準と比べる
    1. 低頻度
    2. 中頻度
    3. 高頻度

--

  - 対比は次の2つ
      1. 中頻度 vs 低頻度
      2. 高頻度 vs 中頻度

::::

:::: pull-right

```{r schema-repeated-contrasts, echo = FALSE}
demoDataFreq <- tribble(
  ~frequency, ~rt,
  "low", 267,
  "medium", 304,
  "high", 401
) |>
mutate(
  lag.rt = rt - lag(rt),
  frequency = factor(
    frequency,
    levels = c("low", "medium", "high")
  )
)

label.y <- demoDataFreq |>
  filter(
    frequency != "low"
  ) |>
  mutate(
    rt = rt - abs(lag.rt)/2,
    label = c(
      "paste(italic(β)[1], '= medium - low')",
      "paste(italic(β)[2], '= high - medium')"
    )
  )

demoDataFreq |>
  ggplot(
    aes(
      x = frequency,
      y = rt
    )
  ) +
  geom_col(
    fill = "grey"
  ) +
  #### grand mean as intercept
  geom_hline(
    yintercept = mean(demoDataFreq$rt),
    linetype = "dotted",
    colour = "red",
    size = 1
  ) +
  geom_label(
    aes(
      x = "low",
      y = mean(rt),
    ),
    parse = TRUE,
    label = "paste(italic(β)[0], '= Grand Mean')"
  ) +
  #### difference between low and medium
  geom_segment(
    aes(
      x = "medium",
      y = demoDataFreq |>
        filter(frequency == "low") |>
        dplyr::select(rt) |>
        pull(),
      xend = "medium",
      yend = demoDataFreq |>
        filter(frequency == "medium") |>
        dplyr::select(rt) |>
        pull()
    ),
    arrow = arrow(
      length = unit(0.1, "inches"),
      ends = "both"
    ),
    position = position_nudge(x = -0.5),
    colour = "red",
    size = 0.75
  ) +
  #### difference between medium and high
  geom_segment(
    aes(
      x = "high",
      y = demoDataFreq |>
        filter(frequency == "medium") |>
        dplyr::select(rt) |>
        pull(),
      xend = "high",
      yend = demoDataFreq |>
        filter(frequency == "high") |>
        dplyr::select(rt) |>
        pull()
    ),
    arrow = arrow(
      length = unit(0.1, "inches"),
      ends = "both"
    ),
    position = position_nudge(x = -0.5),
    colour = "red",
    size = 0.75
  ) +
  geom_label(
    data = label.y,
    aes(
      x = frequency,
      y = rt,
      label = label
    ),
    parse = TRUE,
    position = position_nudge(x = -0.5)
  ) +
  labs(
    x = "Word Frequency",
    y = "Reaction Time"
  )
```
